name: @codewatch/root
description: An error logging and monitoring package

scripts.build-pd: npm run build-pd -w @codewatch/types && npm run build-pd -w @codewatch/core && npm run build-pd -w @codewatch/postgres && npm run build-pd -w @codewatch/ui && npm run build-pd -w @codewatch/express
